faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: In many respects the Baltic Sea is unique in the world; more importantly it is marked with significant human impact on its present state. The course introduces the regime, biota and the present state of the Baltic Sea and the issues of its protection.
description.et: Läänemeri on maailmas mitmeti ainulaadne ning väga tugeva inimmõju all olev riimveekogu. Aines antakse ülevaade veekogu rezhiimist, elustikust, praegusest seisundist ja kaitse probleemidest.

objectives.en: The course gives an overview of the brackish sea that borders Estonia, the Baltic Sea.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade Eestiga piirneva Läänemere rezhiimist, elustikust, praegusest seisundist ja kaitse probleemidest.

learning_outcomes.en: The students have knowledges about the regime, biota and the present state of the Baltic Sea and the issues of its protection.
learning_outcomes.et: Aine läbinutel on ülevaade veekogu rezhiimist, elustikust, praegusest seisundist ja kaitse probleemidest.

description.et: Positiivne hinne - 50% testi küsimustele vastamine õigesti

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

structural_unit.address:
